post.descrizione: Thank you for visiting us and for wanting to discover and get to know one of the most suggestive Venetian villas. Our staff is at your disposal for any need and to answer your curiosities. We remind you that you can take advantage of a refreshment area for a moment of relaxation and to taste the volcanic wines produced by the vineyards around the residence. Follow us on the social channels to keep up to date on the cultural, musical and food and wine events organized in the villa and in the spa garden.Â Visit our website to learn about themed guided tours and other curious and fun activities for adults and children. We hope to have you back with us soon to let you experience all the magic of an experience between land, water and sky again. Best regards, the Miola family.

common.title: Welcome in Villa Selvatico
